thread.title: Ranveer Singh Is Back To Being Bollywood Ka Dost, Helps Alia Bhatt Promote Badrinath Ki Dulhania
thread.title_full: Ranveer Singh Is Back To Being Bollywood Ka Dost, Helps Alia Bhatt Promote Badrinath Ki Dulhania

title: Ranveer Singh Is Back To Being Bollywood Ka Dost, Helps Alia Bhatt Promote Badrinath Ki Dulhania
text:
facebook 642 SHARES 
Ranveer Singh helping out his B-town BFFs to promote a film is nothing new. He's been at it since last year, and what's interesting is the promotion tactic that he comes up with. Where most celebrities would send out a Tweet or an Instagram post, urging their fans to check out a particular film, Ranveer Singh does it differently (why are we not surprised?). To promote Alia Bhatt and Varun Dhawan's latest flick, Badrinath Ki Dulhania , he dressed up as a surd, singing along to the Tamma Tamma anthem in the film. 
You need us to tell you how cute the video is; here, give it a watch. — Ranveer Singh (@RanveerOfficial) February 26, 2017 Photo credits: Twitter / BCCL
